original_text: But I will punish the people of that country who give them trouble. After this, your descendants will leave that country. They will take many valuable things with them.
korean_text: 그들이 섬기는 나라를 내가 징벌할지며 그 후에 네 자손이 큰 재물을 이끌고 나오리라

sentences.original_text: But I will punish the people of that country
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 그 나라의 백성을 벌할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: your descendants will leave that country
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 자손들이 그 나라를 떠날 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will take many valuable things with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 많은 귀중한 것들을 가지고 갈 것입니다
